ComicInfo.Summary:
After witnessing a shameless and pathetic human ritual known as a "Talent Show", in which the winner gets PRAISE and EXULTATION for just bringing in some cool animal, ZIM decides to capture a Snarlbeast, one of the most feared monsters in the galaxy. Then, how the humans will worship him!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Dave Crosland | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Louie Del Carmen | 2 | Note: The digital edition (5/18/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 23:45:33. [CVDB530779]
ComicInfo.Characters: Davey Gutzmann, Dib Membrane, Gaz Membrane, GIR, Ms. Bitters, Recap Kid, Snarl Beast, Zim
